massqc_sample_correlation

Source: R/massqc_sample_correlation.R
massqc_sample_correlation.Rd

Boxplot for each samples.

massqc_sample_correlation(
  object,
  cor_method = c("spearman", "kendall", "pearson"),
  method = c("circle", "square"),
  type = c("full", "lower", "upper"),
  ggtheme = ggplot2::theme_bw,
  title = "",
  show.legend = TRUE,
  legend.title = "Correlation",
  show.diag = FALSE,
  colors = c("blue", "white", "red"),
  outline.color = "gray",
  hc.order = FALSE,
  order_by,
  hc.method = "complete",
  lab = FALSE,
  lab_col = "black",
  lab_size = 4,
  p.mat = NULL,
  sig.level = 0.05,
  insig = c("pch", "blank"),
  pch = 4,
  pch.col = "black",
  pch.cex = 5,
  tl.cex = 12,
  tl.col = "black",
  tl.srt = 45,
  digits = 2
)

Arguments

object

tidymass-class object.

cor_method

?cor

method

?ggcorrplot

type

?ggcorrplot

ggtheme

?ggcorrplot

title

?ggcorrplot

show.legend

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

lab

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

?ggcorrplot

Value

ggplot2 plot.

Author

Xiaotao Shen shenxt1990@163.com

Examples

library(massdataset)
library(tidyverse)
data("expression_data")
data("sample_info")
data("variable_info")

object =
  create_mass_dataset(
    expression_data = expression_data,
    sample_info = sample_info,
    variable_info = variable_info
  )

object %>%
  massqc_sample_correlation()
#> Warning: NA will be set as 0.
#> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.


object %>%
  massqc_sample_correlation()
#> Warning: NA will be set as 0.
#> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.


object %>%
  activate_mass_dataset(what = "sample_info") %>%
  filter(class == "QC") %>%
  massqc_sample_correlation()
#> Warning: NA will be set as 0.
#> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.


object %>%
  massqc_sample_correlation(lab = TRUE)
#> Warning: NA will be set as 0.
#> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.


object %>%
  massqc_sample_correlation(lab = TRUE, type = "upper")
#> Warning: NA will be set as 0.
#> Warning: `guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.
